name: CrawfordCountyNow
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Add Crawford County Now to your Flash Briefing to get today's top headlines from CrawfordCountyNow.com. The biggest stories from Crawford County can be found at CrawfordCountyNow.com, and the top stories are heard on the Crawford County Now Flash Briefing.

After enabling this skill, say things like “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what’s in the news” to hear your flash briefing.

Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to move Crawford County Now to the top of your news brief!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
